snippet: A Manhattan exhibition displays neo-Classical and early Modern canvases; in Brooklyn, a free event at St. Francis College blends Haitian and Dominican traditions.
lead_paragraph: A Manhattan exhibition displays neo-Classical and early Modern canvases; in Brooklyn, a free event at St. Francis College blends Haitian and Dominican traditions.

headline.main: Danish Art’s Subtler Sides at Scandinavia House
headline.print_headline: Danish Art’s Subtler Sides at Scandinavia House
